original: de lta bur gyur pa ni bral bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa ni bral bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the state of being endowed is reversed.

original: 'di 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni bar mchod par ro//
analyzed: 'di 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni bar mchod par ro//
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way‚Äù refers to the middle verse.

original: @132a * // gang gi phyir ldan pa snang ba med pa'i gtan tshigs des na /
analyzed: @132a * // gang gi phyir ldan pa snang ba med pa'i gtan tshigs des na /
translated: Since the reason for the non-appearance of the possessor is the same,

original: de nyid ces bya ba bar mchod pa'i mtshan nying gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba bar mchod pa'i mtshan nying gang yin pa'o //
translated: ‚Äúthat itself‚Äù refers to the characteristics of the middle verse.

original: logs shig la zhes bya ba rnam par dbye ba'i dngos po gnyis las khyad par gzhan spangs pas 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: logs shig la zhes bya ba rnam par dbye ba'i dngos po gnyis las khyad par gzhan spangs pas 'jog pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIn a different way‚Äù means that it is posited by excluding other differences from the two things that are distinguished.

original: de bzhin du khyad par gzhan la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par gzhan la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be said in a similar way about other differences.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yan lag can dang yon tan la sogs pa mngon sum la tha dad par snang ba med pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yan lag can dang yon tan la sogs pa mngon sum la tha dad par snang ba med pa de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Since the possessor, quality, etc. do not appear as different in perception,

original: sgra shes te sgra dang / rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang yin pa de gnyis ni brtags pa'i don can yin te /
analyzed: sgra shes te sgra dang / rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang yin pa de gnyis ni brtags pa'i don can yin te /
translated: the cognition of sound and the conceptual cognition are both imputed objects.

original: dngos por rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ni ma yin no zhes khyab ba yin no /
analyzed: dngos por rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ni ma yin no zhes khyab ba yin no /
translated: They are not objects that are the own characteristic of a thing. This is the pervasion.

original: gang gis brtags pa'i yul can yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis brtags pa'i yul can yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúBy what are they imputed objects?‚Äù

original: brda'i dus na yod pa dngos po tha dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pas brtags te /
analyzed: brda'i dus na yod pa dngos po tha dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pas brtags te /
translated: At the time of the sign, it is imagined by the conceptual thought that follows the different things that exist.

original: brtag par bya ba'i don 'di gnyis la yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: brtag par bya ba'i don 'di gnyis la yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because these two objects of imagination exist,

original: de brtags pa'i don can yin no //
analyzed: de brtags pa'i don can yin no //
translated: it has the meaning of being imagined.

original: dper na yon tan la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa tsam la snang ba rnams le'am /
analyzed: dper na yon tan la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa tsam la snang ba rnams le'am /
translated: For example, like the qualities and so on that appear to mere conceptual thought,

original: yang na zhi gang dang ma skyes pa dag la ste /
analyzed: yang na zhi gang dang ma skyes pa dag la ste /
translated: or like the past, future, and non-arisen.

original: ra ma dang stobs can dang / dung la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: ra ma dang stobs can dang / dung la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang sgra bzhin no //
translated: Like the conceptual thought and sound of a goat, a strong man, and a conch, and so on.

original: rang nyid mtshan nyid med par ni gnyi ga la ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang nyid mtshan nyid med par ni gnyi ga la ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not established for both that it is without characteristics itself,

original: rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis yul yin pa la rtsod pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis yul yin pa la rtsod pa med do //
translated: there is no dispute that it is an object of mere conceptual thought.

original: bshad ba ni yon tan la sogs pa dang / zhig pa dang / ma skyes pa la sogs pa la gcig nyid kyi tha snyad du byed pa dper brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad ba ni yon tan la sogs pa dang / zhig pa dang / ma skyes pa la sogs pa la gcig nyid kyi tha snyad du byed pa dper brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The explanation is that it is an example of applying the convention of oneness to qualities and so on, cessation, non-arising, and so on.

original: gal te sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag de kho nar dngos po'i yul can ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag de kho nar dngos po'i yul can ma yin nam /
translated: If sound and conceptual thought do not have real entities for their objects,

original: des na de tha dad pa la sogs pa las dngos po tha dad par ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des na de tha dad pa la sogs pa las dngos po tha dad par ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then how can a real entity be different from difference, etc.?

original: sgra'i shes pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sgra'i shes pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúthe cognition of sound.‚Äù

original: mi mthun pa ni gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: mi mthun pa ni gzhan nyid do //
translated: Dissimilarity is difference.

original: 'o na ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: But how is that?

original: 'on kyang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúhowever.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa mi mthun pas dngos po mi mthun pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa mi mthun pas dngos po mi mthun pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
translated: How do you know that a real entity is not dissimilar because of the dissimilarity of conceptual thought?

original: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúthe cognition that has conceptual thought.‚Äù

original: bslad par 'gyur ba ni rnam pa'i khyad par yongs su 'dzin par skyes pa na de 'dra ba nyid kyis phyi rol du mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: bslad par 'gyur ba ni rnam pa'i khyad par yongs su 'dzin par skyes pa na de 'dra ba nyid kyis phyi rol du mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When it arises to apprehend the particular, it is contaminated, and by that very fact, it becomes attached to external things.

original: de las zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo de las so//
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo de las so//
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù means from that cognition that has conceptual thought.üîΩBut the cognitions of possession, etc., are not like that.

original: 'on te yang ldan pa la sogs pa'i blo dag ni de lta ma yin pa des na /
analyzed: 'on te yang ldan pa la sogs pa'i blo dag ni de lta ma yin pa des na /
translated: Therefore,

original: de las don gyi de nyid ji ltar gnas par mi 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: de las don gyi de nyid ji ltar gnas par mi 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that the reality of the object will not be as it is,üîΩthen it is said, ‚Äúin that regard.

original: de la zhes smos so //
analyzed: de la zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said.üîΩüîΩ

original: ldan pa la sogs pa'i blo yang brtags pa'i tha dad pa'i rjes su 'jug bas na /
analyzed: ldan pa la sogs pa'i blo yang brtags pa'i tha dad pa'i rjes su 'jug bas na /
translated: The cognition of possession, etc. is also engaged in the difference of the imagined,

original: bag chags kyi stobs las skyes pa nyid yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyi stobs las skyes pa nyid yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: and so it is thought that it is born from the power of the latent impressions.

original: des ni ldan pa la @132b sogs pa brtags pa nyid tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: des ni ldan pa la @132b sogs pa brtags pa nyid tha dad pa ste /
translated: By that, the possession, etc. is just the imagined difference,

original: tha dad pa'i tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: and the difference is to be conventionally designated.

original: don gyi de kho na nyid ni ldan pa la sogs par tha dad ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don gyi de kho na nyid ni ldan pa la sogs par tha dad ba ma yin no //
translated: The reality of the object is not different as possession, etc.

original: gal te brtags pa'i don tha dad pa yang don tha dad pa nyid ma yin nam des na rnam par rtog pa bag chags kyi stobs las skyes pa yin no zhes ci ste brjod snyam na /
analyzed: gal te brtags pa'i don tha dad pa yang don tha dad pa nyid ma yin nam des na rnam par rtog pa bag chags kyi stobs las skyes pa yin no zhes ci ste brjod snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúIs not the difference of the imagined object also the difference of the object? Then why is it said that it is born from the power of the latent impressions of conceptualization?üîΩ‚Äù It is said, ‚ÄúThe difference of the imagined object.

original: rnam par brtags pa'i don tha dad pa ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam par brtags pa'i don tha dad pa ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: The meaning of the different analyses.üîΩ

original: thug pa med mod skyon ci yod snyam pa la /
analyzed: thug pa med mod skyon ci yod snyam pa la /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúThere is no end, but what is the fault?üîΩ‚Äù It is said, ‚ÄúIf one accepts it in that way.

original: de ltar khas len na ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar khas len na ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you accept that, then . . .üîΩ

original: phan tshun rtsod par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi don mtha' dag grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun rtsod par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi don mtha' dag grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And there would be no mutual dispute, because all the aims of all are accomplished.

original: bag chags las brtags pa'i zhes bya ba ni bag chags las skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pas brtags pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: bag chags las brtags pa'i zhes bya ba ni bag chags las skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pas brtags pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The meaning of imagined from habitual tendencies is that it is imagined by conceptual thoughts that arise from habitual tendencies.

original: rnam par rtog pa de ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhes bya ba la ni yid la bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhes bya ba la ni yid la bzhag pa'o //
translated: What kind of conceptual thought is it? It is the one that is placed in the mind.

original: gang gis rnam par brtags pa'i don la sgra dang blo rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dag gis 'jug pa de nyid do //
analyzed: gang gis rnam par brtags pa'i don la sgra dang blo rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dag gis 'jug pa de nyid do //
translated: It is that very [conceptual thought] by which the meaning that is imagined is engaged through the concomitance and reversal of words and thoughts.

original: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi skyes bu dang dbyig pa la sogs pa ni rgyud la ltos te nang gi dbye ba zhes bya ba bral ba las /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi skyes bu dang dbyig pa la sogs pa ni rgyud la ltos te nang gi dbye ba zhes bya ba bral ba las /
translated: The concomitance of the person, stick, and so on is called the internal division in dependence on the continuum, which is different from the disjunction.

original: tha dad pa gang yin pa res 'ga' bar brtags pa tha dad pa lta bur de tha dad pa nyid ni ma yin par snang ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa gang yin pa res 'ga' bar brtags pa tha dad pa lta bur de tha dad pa nyid ni ma yin par snang ba'o //
translated: That which is sometimes imagined to be different, like a different appearance, is not really different.

original: dngos po de kho na med pa'i phyir na tha dad pa snang ba tsam yin no //
analyzed: dngos po de kho na med pa'i phyir na tha dad pa snang ba tsam yin no //
translated: Because that entity does not exist, the difference is merely apparent.

original: 'on te yon tan la sogs pa la grangs yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'on te yon tan la sogs pa la grangs yod pa nyid de /
translated: But if you think that the number of qualities, etc. exists,

original: des na gcig go zhes rtog pa yin no snyam na ;
analyzed: des na gcig go zhes rtog pa yin no snyam na ;
translated: and that therefore there is a single entity,

original: de la grangs ni med do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de la grangs ni med do zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said that ‚Äúthere is no number there.‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba ni yon tan la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni yon tan la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to qualities, etc.

original: rten gyi grangs nye bar btags pa las gcig ces tha snyad du byed pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: rten gyi grangs nye bar btags pa las gcig ces tha snyad du byed pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that the convention of ‚Äúone‚Äù is made on the basis of the number of the substratum,

original: rten gyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rten gyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said that ‚Äúthe substratum is different.‚Äù

original: yon tan gyi rten ni rdzas yin no //
analyzed: yon tan gyi rten ni rdzas yin no //
translated: The substratum of the quality is the substance.

original: ci'i phyir snyam na rten tha dad bya zhes gsungs so //üîΩspyi la sogs pa zhes sogs pa'i sgras ni yan lag can no //
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam na rten tha dad bya zhes gsungs so // spyi la sogs pa zhes sogs pa'i sgras ni yan lag can no //
translated: Why? It is said that ‚Äúthe substratum is different.‚ÄùüîΩThe word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù in ‚Äúuniversals, etc.‚Äù refers to wholes.

original: rdzas du ma can gyi grangs dang ldan pa la sogs pa nyid ni gcig nyid du tha snyad byed do //
analyzed: rdzas du ma can gyi grangs dang ldan pa la sogs pa nyid ni gcig nyid du tha snyad byed do //
translated: The convention of ‚Äúone‚Äù is made for that which possesses the number of a plurality of substances.

original: des na rten gyi grangs nye bar btags pa las de ltar tha snyad byed pa ni ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na rten gyi grangs nye bar btags pa las de ltar tha snyad byed pa ni ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that the convention is made in dependence on the number of the basis.

original: 'o na rten gyi grangs nye bar btags pa med pa'i phyir 'di la gcig nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad du ji ltar 'gyur zhes brjod pa ni zhes pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na rten gyi grangs nye bar btags pa med pa'i phyir 'di la gcig nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad du ji ltar 'gyur zhes brjod pa ni zhes pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: But if the number of the basis is not posited, then how could the convention of one and so on be made in dependence on it?

original: 'dir dogs pa bsu nas lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir dogs pa bsu nas lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: In response to this qualm, he says:

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: If you assert that the cause of the convention of one and so onüîΩis imputed to be one,üîΩthen why is it not the cause of the convention of many?

original: gal te zhig pa dang ma skyes pa la sogs pa 'dir gcig nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyun ni gcig nyid du brtags pa yin par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te zhig pa dang ma skyes pa la sogs pa 'dir gcig nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyun ni gcig nyid du brtags pa yin par 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that the cause of the convention of one and so on in this context is imputed to be one, such as the disintegration of a thing and its nonarising,

original: de'i tshe gang gi rgyu mtshan du de @133a * //üîΩ'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe gang gi rgyu mtshan du de @133a * // 'dod pa ste /
translated: then why is it not the cause of the convention of many?üîΩThat is, why is it not the cause of the convention of many?üîΩThe imputation that is asserted as the cause,üîΩthat is, the producer, of the sound and cognition in this context,

original: sgra dang shes ba gang dag gi rgyu mtshan du ste skyed byed du 'dir 'dod pa'i nye bar brtags pa de nyid dngos po thams cad la /
analyzed: sgra dang shes ba gang dag gi rgyu mtshan du ste skyed byed du 'dir 'dod pa'i nye bar brtags pa de nyid dngos po thams cad la /
translated: is imputed to all things.

original: sgra dang shes pa de dag gi rgyur ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: sgra dang shes pa de dag gi rgyur ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: Why not accept that sound and consciousness are the cause of that?üîΩIf you accept that, then there is no difference at all.

original: de 'dod na cung zad chad pa ni med da snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dod na cung zad chad pa ni med da snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is what he thinks.

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni thog ma med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni thog ma med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: To make this clear, he says, ‚ÄúThe cause is the conception of unity, etc., that is imagined by beginningless conceptualization.‚Äù

original: thog ma med pa'i rtog pas gcig nyid la sogs par lhag par sgro btags pa ste nye bar btags pa gang yin pa de nyid rgyu mtshan yin gyi gzhan du mthong ba ni gzhan du lhag par sgro btags pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i rtog pas gcig nyid la sogs par lhag par sgro btags pa ste nye bar btags pa gang yin pa de nyid rgyu mtshan yin gyi gzhan du mthong ba ni gzhan du lhag par sgro btags pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
translated: The cause is just that which is imagined, that is, superimposed, as unity, etc., by beginningless conceptualization. It is not that the cause is seen as something else, as the basis for the superimposition of something else.

original: sgra dang shes ba dag gi zhes bya ba ni skabs las so //
analyzed: sgra dang shes ba dag gi zhes bya ba ni skabs las so //
translated: ‚ÄúOf sound and consciousness‚Äù is supplied from the context.

original: gcig nyid la sogs pa dngos brtags pa'i skabs ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid la sogs pa dngos brtags pa'i skabs ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The context is the imagined reality of unity, etc., not the existence of unity, etc.üîΩIf you say, ‚ÄúIt is not imagined in all cases,‚Äù he replies, ‚ÄúThe difference is due to a distinction in the cause.‚Äù

original: gal te kun la nye bar btags min zhes bya ba ni gtso bo la ltos pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te kun la nye bar btags min zhes bya ba ni gtso bo la ltos pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: He means that it is because it depends on primal substance.

original: lan du tha dad khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du tha dad khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is, ‚ÄúThe difference is due to a distinction in the cause.‚Äù

original: tha dad pa'i khyad par can ma yin yang 'khrul ba med pa'i rtog pa'i yul nyid kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i khyad par can ma yin yang 'khrul ba med pa'i rtog pa'i yul nyid kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The intended meaning is that although it is not a distinct difference, it is the primary object of an unmistaken thought.

original: rtsod pa ni khyad par tha dad pa med pa la autpala dang sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra tha dad don med do zhe na /
analyzed: rtsod pa ni khyad par tha dad pa med pa la autpala dang sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra tha dad don med do zhe na /
translated: The argument is that for a difference that is not distinct, the words lotus and blue and so on are different but meaningless.

original: grub pa'i mtha'i ni don gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha'i ni don gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The philosophical position is stated in different meaning and so on.

original: gal te der yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi ste /
analyzed: gal te der yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi ste /
translated: Even there refers to the other,

original: yon tan la sogs par yang ngo //
analyzed: yon tan la sogs par yang ngo //
translated: and also to qualities and so on.

original: lan du yon tan rdzas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du yon tan rdzas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is The substance of the quality...

original: gzhan gyi phyogs bsal nas rang gi 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa ni don gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi don te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs bsal nas rang gi 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa ni don gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi don te /
translated: Having refuted the opponent's position, the author's own assertion is summarized in The meaning is not a different object.

original: yul gang la yang yod pa'i sgra dang shes pa de dag la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: yul gang la yang yod pa'i sgra dang shes pa de dag la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: Those words and cognitions that exist for any object are called that.

original: de dag gi ngo bo ni de nyid do //
analyzed: de dag gi ngo bo ni de nyid do //
translated: Their nature is just that.

original: ldog pa'i dbye ba las tha dad pa ni sgra dang rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i dbye ba las tha dad pa ni sgra dang rtogs pa'o //
translated: The difference from the division of the opposite is the word and the understanding.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'i gtso bo ci la brjod snyam na /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'i gtso bo ci la brjod snyam na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the chief thing that is explained?‚Äù

original: gtso bo yang zhes gsungs so//
analyzed: gtso bo yang zhes gsungs so//
translated: The chief thing is called ‚Äúthe primary.‚Äù

original: 'di las bzlog pa ni phal pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di las bzlog pa ni phal pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement, ‚ÄúThe opposite of this is the secondary,‚Äù is called ‚Äúthe distinction.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir thams cad la nye bar btags pa ni mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad la nye bar btags pa ni mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to impute everything to the primary.üîΩThe statement, ‚ÄúSince the Buddha is not the primary, it is not tenable to impute him to the primary,‚Äù is a distinction.

original: sangs rgyas la ni gtso bo med pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa mi 'thad do zhes brjod pa ni khyad par la ni zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa'i khyad par can kho nar gtso bo yin gyi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la ni gtso bo med pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa mi 'thad do zhes brjod pa ni khyad par la ni zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa'i khyad par can kho nar gtso bo yin gyi /
translated: The primary is only that which has a distinct distinction.

original: khyad par tha dad pa can ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nyid gang las yin te ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par tha dad pa can ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nyid gang las yin te ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: How do you know that it is not that which does not have a distinct distinction? It is not that.

analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: 'du ba can rtogs pa na de la 'dus pa'i autpala yang rtogs par 'gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: When one cognizes the inherence-possessor, one also cognizes the blue lotus as an inherence in that.

original: autpala brjod pa ni don med do //
analyzed: autpala brjod pa ni don med do //
translated: Therefore, the statement about the blue lotus is meaningless.

original: sgra sbyar ba ni don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin na /
analyzed: sgra sbyar ba ni don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin na /
translated: The application of a word is for the purpose of cognizing the meaning.

original: gal te don ji ltar rung bar rtogs na sgra sbyar bas ci bya /
analyzed: gal te don ji ltar rung bar rtogs na sgra sbyar bas ci bya /
translated: If the meaning is cognized as appropriate, what is the use of applying a word?

original: des na gzhi mthun par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na gzhi mthun par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is thought that there would be no common locus.

original: shin du gsal ba mthon ting la sogs pa la mdog sdug gu tsam nyid dbyibs 'dis gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: shin du gsal ba mthon ting la sogs pa la mdog sdug gu tsam nyid dbyibs 'dis gnas pa yin no //
translated: In the case of a very clear object, such as a high mountain, it is only the beautiful color that is located in the shape.

original: des na khyad par can gyi don med par yang khyad par rtogs pa yin no zhes ;
analyzed: des na khyad par can gyi don med par yang khyad par rtogs pa yin no zhes ;
translated: Therefore, even without a special object, a special cognition occurs.

original: rmongs pa'i dogs ba zlog par byed pa ni /
analyzed: rmongs pa'i dogs ba zlog par byed pa ni /
translated: To remove the doubt that this is confused,

original: mthon ting zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthon ting zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: he says, ‚Äúa high mountain, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di yang sngon po'i khyad par can gyi don gzhan nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di yang sngon po'i khyad par can gyi don gzhan nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that the special object of blue is something else.

original: 'dis ni ji skad bshad pa'i sbyor ba la ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni ji skad bshad pa'i sbyor ba la ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: This shows that the application as explained is not unestablished.

original: gal te yang 'ga' zhig tu de lta yin pa de lta na yang nges pa gang las @135a * //
analyzed: gal te yang 'ga' zhig tu de lta yin pa de lta na yang nges pa gang las @135a * //
translated: Even if it were so in some cases, what is the certainty?

original: yin zhes bya ba'i ma nges pa spangs pa brjod pa ni de ltar mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yin zhes bya ba'i ma nges pa spangs pa brjod pa ni de ltar mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To remove the doubt that this is uncertain, he says, ‚Äúin that way, by perception.‚Äù

original: mngon sum la yang 'du ba can rtogs pa nyid 'dus par rtogs pa yin te rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum la yang 'du ba can rtogs pa nyid 'dus par rtogs pa yin te rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In perception, the cognition of the composite is the cognition of the collection, because there is no other reason.

original: 'du ba can 'dzin kyang /
analyzed: 'du ba can 'dzin kyang /
translated: Even if the composite is grasped,

original: 'dus pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa /
analyzed: 'dus pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa /
translated: It is not to hold to a collection.üîΩ

original: sgra 'jug gzhan du ji ltar yin //
analyzed: sgra 'jug gzhan du ji ltar yin //
translated: How can the word be applied to something else?

original: gzhan yang dngos po la mngon par zhen par smra ba 'di la /
analyzed: gzhan yang dngos po la mngon par zhen par smra ba 'di la /
translated: Moreover, for those who maintain that there is a real entity that is the referent of the word,

original: sngon po autpala la nges sam ma nges zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngon po autpala la nges sam ma nges zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: it should be asked whether the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù refers to the blue lotus or not.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang autpala gyi sgra ma sbyar ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang autpala gyi sgra ma sbyar ba'i phyir na /
translated: In either case, the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is not used.

original: gang du gzhi mthun par 'gyur zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: gang du gzhi mthun par 'gyur zhes ston pa ni /
translated: How can there be a common locus?

original: gal te zhes bya ba sngo nyid ces bya ba'i sngo nyid ces bya bas ni chos bstan pa'i sgo nas chos can 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba sngo nyid ces bya ba'i sngo nyid ces bya bas ni chos bstan pa'i sgo nas chos can 'dzin pa'o //
translated: If the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù refers to the blue lotus, then the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù would be the referent of the word ‚Äúlotus.‚Äù

original: gal te autpala la nges pa'i sngon po brjod bya yin na de'i tshe sngon po'i sgras /üîΩde lta bu'i sngon po rtogs pa na /
analyzed: gal te autpala la nges pa'i sngon po brjod bya yin na de'i tshe sngon po'i sgras / de lta bu'i sngon po rtogs pa na /
translated: If the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù refers to the blue lotus, then when the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù is uttered,

original: autpala yang rtogs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: autpala yang rtogs pa'i phyir na /
translated: the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù would be understood.

original: autpala'i sgra don med do //
analyzed: autpala'i sgra don med do //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù would be meaningless.

original: 'on te bya rog dang khu byug la sogs pa autpala ma yin pa la yon tan sngon po yod pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te bya rog dang khu byug la sogs pa autpala ma yin pa la yon tan sngon po yod pa yin na /
translated: But if the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù refers to the blue lotus, then crows, cuckoos, and so on, which are not lotuses, would have the property of blueness.

original: de'i tshe sngon po'i sgras thun mong gi sngon po'i rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i tshe sngon po'i sgras thun mong gi sngon po'i rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur la /
translated: At that time, the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù would realize the nature of the common ‚Äúblue.‚Äù

original: de lta na yang bum pa dang / snam bu ltar gzhi mthun pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na yang bum pa dang / snam bu ltar gzhi mthun pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: However, because there is no common locus, like a pot and a cloth,

original: khyad par can gyi don rtogs pa la nye bar mi mkho ba'i phyir autpala'i sgra don med do //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi don rtogs pa la nye bar mi mkho ba'i phyir autpala'i sgra don med do //
translated: the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is meaningless because it is not necessary to realize the meaning of the qualifier.

original: 'on te sngon po nyid gzhan kho na la yod pa yin no /
analyzed: 'on te sngon po nyid gzhan kho na la yod pa yin no /
translated: But if ‚Äúblue‚Äù exists in only another,

original: de lta yin na yang sngon po'i sgras don gyi tshogs pa gang brjod pa de /
analyzed: de lta yin na yang sngon po'i sgras don gyi tshogs pa gang brjod pa de /
translated: even if that is the case, the collection of meanings expressed by the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù

original: autpala'i sgras ma brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: autpala'i sgras ma brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: is not expressed by the word ‚Äúlotus.‚Äù

original: ji ltar don gcig la 'jug pas byas pa'i gzhi mthun bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar don gcig la 'jug pas byas pa'i gzhi mthun bar 'gyur /
translated: How could there be a common locus by virtue of engaging the same object?

original: de bzhin du autpala'i sgras don gyi chogs gang brjod pa zhes bya bar yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du autpala'i sgras don gyi chogs gang brjod pa zhes bya bar yang sbyar ro //
translated: Similarly, the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is also applied to the collection of meanings expressed by the word ‚Äúblue.‚Äù

original: 'on te / sngon po'i sgras khyab pa autpala'i sgras rnam par gcod la /
analyzed: 'on te / sngon po'i sgras khyab pa autpala'i sgras rnam par gcod la /
translated: But if ‚Äúblue‚Äù is pervaded by the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù and excluded by the word ‚Äúblue,‚Äù

original: autpala'i sgras khyab pa autpala'i dkar po la sogs pa yang sngon po'i sgras gcod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: autpala'i sgras khyab pa autpala'i dkar po la sogs pa yang sngon po'i sgras gcod par byed pa yin no //
translated: The word blue excludes the white lotus, etc., which are pervaded by the word lotus.

original: des na autpala sngon po gcig la chos gnyi ga yod pa'i phyir na gzhi mthun par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: des na autpala sngon po gcig la chos gnyi ga yod pa'i phyir na gzhi mthun par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: Therefore, since both properties exist in a single blue lotus, there would be a common locus.

original: de yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de yang mi 'thad de /
translated: That is also unacceptable.

original: gang gi phyir khyab pa zhes bya bas ni gsal ba'i don brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyab pa zhes bya bas ni gsal ba'i don brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because the word pervasion expresses the meaning of manifestation.

original: des na ji snyed cig gis gsal ba'i don de mtha' dag ci ltar gzhan gyis rnam par bcad par nus /
analyzed: des na ji snyed cig gis gsal ba'i don de mtha' dag ci ltar gzhan gyis rnam par bcad par nus /
translated: Therefore, how could the entirety of that meaning of manifestation, which is as extensive as possible, be excluded by another?

original: mngon sum gyis gsal ba'i don ni gzhan gyis rnam par bcad par mi nus so //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis gsal ba'i don ni gzhan gyis rnam par bcad par mi nus so //
translated: The meaning of manifestation by direct perception cannot be excluded by another.

original: 'o na gnyis pa sbyar ba ci dgos she na /
analyzed: 'o na gnyis pa sbyar ba ci dgos she na /
translated: If one asks, Then what is the purpose of applying the second [exclusion]?

original: dngos po brjod par bya ba'i phyogs la 'di nyid bcad bar bya ba @135b yin no //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir mjug sdud pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po brjod par bya ba'i phyogs la 'di nyid bcad bar bya ba @135b yin no // de nyid kyi phyir mjug sdud pa ni /
translated: In the context of expressing entities, this [second exclusion] is what is to be excluded.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the summary is stated with Therefore, etc.

original: cha med par mngon sum la snang ba'i autpala sngon po la sngon po nyid dang autpala nyid tha dad ba yin la /
analyzed: cha med par mngon sum la snang ba'i autpala sngon po la sngon po nyid dang autpala nyid tha dad ba yin la /
translated: The blue and the lotus appear in perception as partless, but the blueness and the lotus are different.

original: autpala gzhan dang za mi dad pa yin te /
analyzed: autpala gzhan dang za mi dad pa yin te /
translated: The lotus is different from the blue,

original: gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are cognized as one.

original: gzi mthun pa yang de la ltos nas yin te ;
analyzed: gzi mthun pa yang de la ltos nas yin te ;
translated: And the similarity is in dependence on that,

original: des na don de 'dra ba med kyang blo nyid de lta de ltar 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na don de 'dra ba med kyang blo nyid de lta de ltar 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: because the cognition itself proceeds in that way, even though there is no such object.

original: rnam grangs pa nyid la sogs ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs pa nyid la sogs ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a nominal convention, etc.

original: slu ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: slu ba yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not deceptive,

original: de ma yin pa las ldog pa'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma yin pa las ldog pa'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for the exclusion of what is not that.üîΩThis is also explained by the author of the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika.

original: 'di yang rnam 'grel mdzad pa nyid kyis bshad pa yin no zhes ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: 'di yang rnam 'grel mdzad pa nyid kyis bshad pa yin no zhes ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o//
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù indicates that it has been explained.

original: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni grangs so dang ldan pa'i sgra ni rnam grangs min zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas so //
analyzed: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni grangs so dang ldan pa'i sgra ni rnam grangs min zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAlready‚Äù indicates the number. The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is connected to ‚Äúnon-nominal convention.‚Äù

original: lhag ma chad pa ni der yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma chad pa ni der yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The remainder is supplied by ‚Äúthere.‚Äù

original: yon tan gcig go zhes bya ba la sogs pa yon tan la yang grangs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yon tan gzhan yod do snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: yon tan gcig go zhes bya ba la sogs pa yon tan la yang grangs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yon tan gzhan yod do snyam du dogs na /
translated: One quality, etc. If you think that a quality also has another quality, the characteristic of number,

original: de ltar yin na zhes pa'o ;
analyzed: de ltar yin na zhes pa'o ;
translated: then it would be so,

original: / ji ltar 'di gnyis khyad par med par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: / ji ltar 'di gnyis khyad par med par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How would these two be undifferentiated?

original: 'di ltar zhes gsungs so //üîΩgal te de lta yin mod /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes gsungs so // gal te de lta yin mod /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: skabs la ci 'ongs snyam na /
analyzed: skabs la ci 'ongs snyam na /
translated: If that is so, what is the relevance?

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: The cause of the collection of qualities, etc.

original: ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid ni ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan na ste 'brel 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid ni ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan na ste 'brel 'gyur ro //
translated: The cause of the collection of qualities such as conjunction is when there is possession of qualities such as conjunction, i.e., when there is connection.

original: btung ba la sogs pa la yang gzugs la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yang ngo snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: btung ba la sogs pa la yang gzugs la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yang ngo snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is thought that even drinking, etc. possesses qualities such as form.

original: de lta na yang ji ltar khyad par med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang ji ltar khyad par med par 'gyur te /
translated: Even so, how would they be undifferentiated?

original: bya ba dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam na /
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam na /
translated: Because they are not possessed of action.

original: lci ba nyid ces gsungs so //
analyzed: lci ba nyid ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'on ji ltar khyad par rnams tha dad med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on ji ltar khyad par rnams tha dad med pa'i phyir /
translated: But how is it that the differences are not different?üîΩ

original: blo tha dad par 'gyur /
analyzed: blo tha dad par 'gyur /
translated: But how can the cognition be different, since the particulars are not different?

original: de'i tha dad pa bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba yin na yang /
analyzed: de'i tha dad pa bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba yin na yang /
translated: If the difference in the cognition arises from the power of the latent impressions,üîΩhow can it not be deceptive?

original: ji ltar slu bar mi 'gyur ba'i dogs pa spang bar rnam 'grel gyi lhag ma nye bar sdud pa'i sgo nas 'chad pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar slu bar mi 'gyur ba'i dogs pa spang bar rnam 'grel gyi lhag ma nye bar sdud pa'i sgo nas 'chad pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The remainder of the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika is a summary of the solution to this problem.

original: de ma yin pa'i las ldog pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyi na /
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i las ldog pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyi na /
translated: Since it is based on the exclusion of what is not that,

original: slu ba ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: slu ba ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: it is not deceptive.

original: las ma yin pa nyid dam rdzas ma yin pa nyid kyang spyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: las ma yin pa nyid dam rdzas ma yin pa nyid kyang spyi ni ma yin te /
translated: A universal is not a non-entity or a non-substance,

original: spyi la yang yod pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: spyi la yang yod pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because it exists.

original: de bzhin du ci rigs par dpag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ci rigs par dpag par bya'o //
translated: This should be applied in the appropriate way to the others.üîΩThe words ‚Äúnon-entity‚Äù and ‚Äúnon-substance‚Äù refer to

original: las ma yin pa dang rdzas ma yin pa'i sgra der ni'o //
analyzed: las ma yin pa dang rdzas ma yin pa'i sgra der ni'o //
translated: that.

original: de dang ldan pa las grangs la sogs pa tha dad pa bzhin du zhes @136a * //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa las grangs la sogs pa tha dad pa bzhin du zhes @136a * //
translated: Just as number, etc., are different from that which possesses them,

original: 'brel to // de yang chos gzhan khyad par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan dkar po nyid ma yin pa zlog par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'brel to // de yang chos gzhan khyad par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan dkar po nyid ma yin pa zlog par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: And it is a property-possessor that is qualified by another property, that is, by the property of being white, which excludes the opposite of white.

original: tha dad par bstan pa tsam gyis /
analyzed: tha dad par bstan pa tsam gyis /
translated: The mere indication of difference

original: dngos bo tha dad par 'grub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos bo tha dad par 'grub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: does not establish the difference of the entities.

original: 'di nyid bzlog pa ni de tsam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid bzlog pa ni de tsam zhes bya'o //
translated: The negation of this is ‚Äúmerely that.‚Äù

original: de tsam shes par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni ldog pa tsam shes par 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: de tsam shes par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni ldog pa tsam shes par 'dod pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne who wishes to know merely that‚Äù means one who wishes to know merely the exclusion.

original: 'greng ba la sogs pa'i chos gzhan kun gang yin pa de dag gang gis 'phangs pa med bar ro //
analyzed: 'greng ba la sogs pa'i chos gzhan kun gang yin pa de dag gang gis 'phangs pa med bar ro //
translated: All other properties of the stick, such as standing, are not implied.

original: ston bar byed pa'i sgra gzhan gyi go skabs 'byed pa ni 'phangs pa yin no //
analyzed: ston bar byed pa'i sgra gzhan gyi go skabs 'byed pa ni 'phangs pa yin no //
translated: The implication is the opening of an opportunity for another statement that indicates.

original: gang gi tshe sor mo ldan par gyur to zhes chos can dang gzhi mthun par chos brjod pa'i sgra sbyar ba de'i tshe 'greng ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi skabs yod ba yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sor mo ldan par gyur to zhes chos can dang gzhi mthun par chos brjod pa'i sgra sbyar ba de'i tshe 'greng ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi skabs yod ba yin la /
translated: When the statement that expresses the property is applied to the subject and the basis, as in ‚ÄúThe stick-possessor is standing,‚Äù then there is an opportunity for the distinction of standing, etc.

original: sor mo'i ldan pa zhes bya bar ni chos can dang gzhi mthun pa'i khyad par gzhan gyi sgra'i go skabs yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sor mo'i ldan pa zhes bya bar ni chos can dang gzhi mthun pa'i khyad par gzhan gyi sgra'i go skabs yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The term having fingers does not admit of any other distinction of the common locus of the property and the subject.

original: rtogs par bya bas shes par 'dod pa yang de tsam nyid yin no //
analyzed: rtogs par bya bas shes par 'dod pa yang de tsam nyid yin no //
translated: The cognition of the object is also just that much.

original: de bzhin du dkar po la sogs pa'i sgra la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dkar po la sogs pa'i sgra la yang ngo //
translated: The same is the case with the terms white etc.

original: gal te gnyi gas kyang don gcig kho na brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te gnyi gas kyang don gcig kho na brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: If both express only one object,

original: rnam bar dbye ba 'dir ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: rnam bar dbye ba 'dir ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: how can there be this distinction?

original: don gcig brjod kyang zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: don gcig brjod kyang zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said: Even though one object is expressed...

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos can brjod pa nyid du rnam par gzhag par byas pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos can brjod pa nyid du rnam par gzhag par byas pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The word thus refers to the determination that the property and the subject are expressed.

original: de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: That is what is meant by thus.

original: de'i phyogs gcig ces bya ba ni ba lang 'ga' zhig kho na dkar po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig ces bya ba ni ba lang 'ga' zhig kho na dkar po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word part refers to the fact that some cows alone are white.

original: 'dzin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'i yod ba'i zhes bya ba yi ni snam bu la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'i yod ba'i zhes bya ba yi ni snam bu la sogs pa la'o //
translated: The word existent refers to cloth etc. which are possessed of another apprehension.

original: tha dad pa ni zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba la dkar po nyid ni ldog pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa ni zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba la dkar po nyid ni ldog pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúDifferent‚Äù means that cowness is the universal, while whiteness is the particular.

original: rjes su mi 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su mi 'gro ba'o //
translated: Whiteness does not follow cowness, because it is not universal.

original: 'dzin pa gzhan dang ldan pa la ltos nas ni dkar po nyid rjes su 'grol //
analyzed: 'dzin pa gzhan dang ldan pa la ltos nas ni dkar po nyid rjes su 'grol //
translated: But in relation to the other apprehension, whiteness is the universal,

original: ba lang ni ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: ba lang ni ldog pa yin no //
translated: while the cow is the particular.

original: des na ba lang dkar po dag ni tha dad pa'i tha snyang tsam du zad do //
analyzed: des na ba lang dkar po dag ni tha dad pa'i tha snyang tsam du zad do //
translated: Therefore, white cows are just different names.

original: dkar po nyid 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni gang gi tshe thag ring rab tsam nas bsgrubs pa'i cha gzhan dang bral bas blo'i tshad tsam dmigs pa de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: dkar po nyid 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni gang gi tshe thag ring rab tsam nas bsgrubs pa'i cha gzhan dang bral bas blo'i tshad tsam dmigs pa de'i tshe'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhiteness alone‚Äù means that when it is perceived by the mind, it is perceived as the measure of the object, because it is free from other parts that are distant.

original: sngon mthong ba las zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba'i lan 'debs par byed pa'i sdar 'ba' zhig nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon mthong ba las zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba'i lan 'debs par byed pa'i sdar 'ba' zhig nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom what was seen before‚Äù means that the answer to the question is established only by memory.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dri bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dri bar byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHow?‚Äù means the question.

original: 'dis ni tha dad par ston pa'i gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni tha dad par ston pa'i gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
translated: This establishes the treatise that teaches difference.

original: 'on tha mi dad par ji ltar ston snyam na /
analyzed: 'on tha mi dad par ji ltar ston snyam na /
translated: But how does it teach non-difference?

original: gang gi cho zhes bya bas gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi cho zhes bya bas gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
translated: The word what introduces the topic.

original: 'dir yang @136b nges par ma shes pa'i khyad par nyid do //üîΩ'on kyang dkar po 'di ci yin chos can dang gzhi mthun pas 'dri ba na /
analyzed: 'dir yang @136b nges par ma shes pa'i khyad par nyid do // 'on kyang dkar po 'di ci yin chos can dang gzhi mthun pas 'dri ba na /
translated: Here, too, it is the very thing that is not known for certain.

original: de kho na ltar lan 'debs pa yin no //
analyzed: de kho na ltar lan 'debs pa yin no //
translated: But when one asks, What is this white thing? in common with the subject, the answer is given in the same way.

original: de kho na'i don ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni de kho nar gyur pa'i don ni de kho na'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na'i don ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni de kho nar gyur pa'i don ni de kho na'i don to //
translated: The meaning of thatness is the meaning of thatness.

original: 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pas bstan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pas bstan par bya ba ste /
translated: The word this refers to what is to be taught by the following verse.

original: tha dad pa yi gnod ma yin //
analyzed: tha dad pa yi gnod ma yin //
translated: It is not harmed by difference.

original: zhes bya ba'i thar pa'i ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i thar pa'i ston par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the teacher of liberation.

original: 'ga' zhig las zhes bya ba mig mi gsal ba dang / thag cung zad ring ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid las tha dad par 'dri ba yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig las zhes bya ba mig mi gsal ba dang / thag cung zad ring ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid las tha dad par 'dri ba yin no //
translated: One asks, From what? in order to ask about difference from something, such as indistinctness of the eye, a slight distance, and so on.

original: de'i phyir na de kho na ltar tha dad pa nyid du mkhas pa len 'debs pas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir na de kho na ltar tha dad pa nyid du mkhas pa len 'debs pas so //
translated: Therefore, the wise one answers, It is just that, difference.

original: rnam pa gang gis lan 'debs snyam na /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis lan 'debs snyam na /
translated: By what mode will he answer?

original: yon tan dkar po 'di rta'i yin no zhes lan 'debs so //
analyzed: yon tan dkar po 'di rta'i yin no zhes lan 'debs so //
translated: He will answer, ‚ÄúThis white quality is that of the horse.‚Äù

original: de lta bu'i rnam par lan 'debs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam par lan 'debs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he will answer in that mode.

original: 'dir ni de lta bu nyid du nges zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dir don gzhan gnas ba ni med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni de lta bu nyid du nges zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dir don gzhan gnas ba ni med pa'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúit is just so‚Äù means that in this world, there is no other meaning that is established.

original: rtog pa dang ldan ba ni 'dri ba'o//
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan ba ni 'dri ba'o//
translated: One who has a concept is a questioner.

original: de zhes bya ba ni dres pa'o //üîΩtshul lugs gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni 'du ba'i stobs kyis yon tan gyi sgo nas /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dres pa'o // tshul lugs gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni 'du ba'i stobs kyis yon tan gyi sgo nas /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the question.

original: yon tan can la sgra 'jug pa //
analyzed: yon tan can la sgra 'jug pa //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother mode‚Äù means that by the power of association, a word is applied to a possessor of a quality by way of a quality.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúThe quality of whiteness is that of the horse.‚Äù

original: tshad ma'i 'jug pa la ltos nas //
analyzed: tshad ma'i 'jug pa la ltos nas //
translated: ‚ÄúIn dependence on the engagement of valid cognition,‚Äù

original: zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de gsal la bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de gsal la bar byed pa ni /
translated: that which is stated is clarified by

original: mngon sum nyid dam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid dam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúis it direct perception?‚Äù

original: des na tha dad srid pa yin te /
analyzed: des na tha dad srid pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is possible that there is a difference.

original: mi srid par 'dod do //
analyzed: mi srid par 'dod do //
translated: It is not possible that there is no difference.

original: 'o na tha dad pa'i tha snyad du ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na tha dad pa'i tha snyad du ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúWell then, how is there a convention of difference?‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes gsungs so //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen . . .‚Äù is stated.

original: srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa las so //
analyzed: srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa las so //
translated: Because of existence means because of the imagined.

original: de lta nyid ces bya ba ni tha dad pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de lta nyid ces bya ba ni tha dad pa nyid du'o //
translated: Just that means just as different.

original: 'o na 'jig rten 'di 'dra ba'i tha dad pa ci ste 'dor zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'jig rten 'di 'dra ba'i tha dad pa ci ste 'dor zhe na /
translated: But why do worldly people not conceive of a difference in that way?

original: 'gro ba'i rtogs pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rtogs pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because of the realization of the world.

original: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i tha dad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i tha dad pa med pa'o //
translated: In that way means without a difference in the ultimate.

original: dngos po sems dang ni don dam pa'i tha dad pa'i sems pas so //
analyzed: dngos po sems dang ni don dam pa'i tha dad pa'i sems pas so //
translated: The thing is the mind, and the ultimate is the mind that is different from the thing.

original: cha de tsam gyis don grub par khas blangs pas bslad par mi sems so zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: cha de tsam gyis don grub par khas blangs pas bslad par mi sems so zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Since it is accepted that the meaning is established by just that much, it is not thought to be adulterated.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: Therefore is a conclusion.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //üîΩbum pa'i zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la sogs pa nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o // bum pa'i zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la sogs pa nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: If is from another.üîΩThe word pot is said to be just form and so on.

original: de nyid kyi gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore it is said that just those are form and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste gzugs kyi gzugs so //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste gzugs kyi gzugs so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe form of form‚Äù is a synecdoche.

original: ro'i ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang blta bar bya'o //üîΩ@137a * // bum pa'i bum pa zhes bya ba la ni tshogs pa la ltos nas te gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi /
analyzed: ro'i ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang blta bar bya'o // @137a * // bum pa'i bum pa zhes bya ba la ni tshogs pa la ltos nas te gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi /
translated: The same should be understood for the phrase ‚Äúthe taste of taste,‚Äù and so on.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe pot of the pot‚Äù is a synecdoche that depends on a collection.

original: gzugs la sogs ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means the form of form, and so on.

original: zhes kyi sgra ni rnam ba de ltar gyi don to //
analyzed: zhes kyi sgra ni rnam ba de ltar gyi don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù means ‚Äúin this way.‚Äù

original: gzugs la sogs pa de rnams kyis mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu ni chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa de rnams kyis mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu ni chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa yin la /
translated: The effect that is similar to the form and so on is the holding of water and so on.

original: de'i rgyu ma yin pa ni snam bu la sogs pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: de'i rgyu ma yin pa ni snam bu la sogs pa gang yin pa de /
translated: The cause of that is not the cloth and so on.

original: de rnam par bcad pa'i don du bum pa'i sgra 'jug go //
analyzed: de rnam par bcad pa'i don du bum pa'i sgra 'jug go //
translated: The word ‚Äúpot‚Äù is used to exclude that.

original: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i nus ba'i khyad par ma spangs par 'jug pa des na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i nus ba'i khyad par ma spangs par 'jug pa des na /
translated: Since the word ‚Äúpot‚Äù is used without excluding the specific capacity of form and so on,

original: phyogs gcig pa 'jug pa gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra dang 'di gzhi mthun par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: phyogs gcig pa 'jug pa gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra dang 'di gzhi mthun par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how can the use of the word ‚Äúform‚Äù and so on, which is partial, be similar to the use of the word ‚Äúpot‚Äù?

original: 'di tsam nyid kyis ni rigs dang tshogs pa'i sgra gnyis kyi khyad par yang legs par gnas pa yin no zhes bshad pa ni des na 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //üîΩthun mong gi bum pa brjod pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi sgra la tshogs pa'i sgra tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di tsam nyid kyis ni rigs dang tshogs pa'i sgra gnyis kyi khyad par yang legs par gnas pa yin no zhes bshad pa ni des na 'di ni zhes bya ba'o // thun mong gi bum pa brjod pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi sgra la tshogs pa'i sgra tha dad pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the difference between the terms ‚Äútype‚Äù and ‚Äúcollection‚Äù is well established.üîΩThe term ‚Äútype‚Äù is different from the term ‚Äúcollection‚Äù because the term ‚Äúcollection‚Äù refers to the common pot.

original: rigs kyi sgra yang so sor nus ba'i brjod pa'i phyir tshogs pa'i sgra las tha dad pa yin no ;
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra yang so sor nus ba'i brjod pa'i phyir tshogs pa'i sgra las tha dad pa yin no ;
translated: The term ‚Äútype‚Äù is also different from the term ‚Äúcollection‚Äù because the term ‚Äútype‚Äù refers to the individual pot.

original: ; gal te yan lag can med pa'i phyir bum pa'i gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba 'dis ci ston zhe na /
analyzed: ; gal te yan lag can med pa'i phyir bum pa'i gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba 'dis ci ston zhe na /
translated: If the term ‚Äúform of the pot‚Äù is used, what is indicated by this?

original: bum pa'i ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bum pa'i ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: The term ‚Äúof the pot‚Äù is used.

original: de nus khyad par gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i nus pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: de nus khyad par gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i nus pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúof the pot‚Äù indicates the particular capacity of form, etc.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the particular capacity?

original: chu la sogs pa 'dzin pa de nyid spyi ste thun mongs bar gyur pa yan lag khyad par du byas pa gang dag yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: chu la sogs pa 'dzin pa de nyid spyi ste thun mongs bar gyur pa yan lag khyad par du byas pa gang dag yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The particular capacity of form, etc., is that which is common to all, i.e., the universal, and which is the cause of the particular of the parts.

original: thun mong gi nus pa'i khyad par can so sor rang gi nus pa dang ldan pa nyid ston pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩ'o na nus pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ba lang nyi shu /
analyzed: thun mong gi nus pa'i khyad par can so sor rang gi nus pa dang ldan pa nyid ston pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // 'o na nus pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ba lang nyi shu /
translated: The meaning is that each one has its own individual power, which is a special kind of power that is shared in common.

original: ba lang rnams kyi nyi shu zhes tha snyad tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: ba lang rnams kyi nyi shu zhes tha snyad tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If there is no difference in power, then how is it that there is a difference in conventions, such as twenty cows and twenty oxen?

original: phyogs 'dis zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is the point he is making.

original: de dag la zhes bya ba ni bum pa la sogs pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag la zhes bya ba ni bum pa la sogs pa dag la'o //
translated: With regard to them means with regard to the pot, etc.

original: so sor nges pa'i nus pa ma 'phangs ba des na'o //üîΩdes na 'di rigs dang ni zhes bya ba 'chad pa ni //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i nus pa ma 'phangs ba des na'o // des na 'di rigs dang ni zhes bya ba 'chad pa ni //
translated: Because the power of each is not projected.üîΩTherefore, this is the explanation of the passage beginning with ‚Äúgenus‚Äù and ending with ‚Äúspecies.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i tshogs pa'i sgra 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dper na nags zhes bya bar 'brel to ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i tshogs pa'i sgra 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dper na nags zhes bya bar 'brel to ;
translated: The word ‚Äútherefore‚Äù is connected with the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù in the passage, ‚Äúbecause of that.‚Äù

original: ; du ba la sogs pa'i gnas ni gzugs la sogs pa yin te des na rdzas gcig la ma ltos par bum pa zhes tshogs pa'i sgras yin no //
analyzed: ; du ba la sogs pa'i gnas ni gzugs la sogs pa yin te des na rdzas gcig la ma ltos par bum pa zhes tshogs pa'i sgras yin no //
translated: The form, etc. of smoke, etc. is the locus, and therefore the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù refers to the pot, etc. without depending on a single substance.

original: rigs kyi sgra ni zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i rdzas so sor chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa nyid la ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ni zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i rdzas so sor chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa nyid la ste /
translated: The word ‚Äútype‚Äù means that the substance of a pot is the same effect as the individual apprehensions of water, etc.

original: dper na shing zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na shing zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the word ‚Äútree.‚Äù

original: du ba la @137b sogs pa so sor grib ma la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gcig sgrub pa la 'jug pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: du ba la @137b sogs pa so sor grib ma la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gcig sgrub pa la 'jug pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the word ‚Äúsmoke,‚Äù which is used to establish the individual effects of smoke, such as the shadow, etc.

original: dper na shing gi sgra rigs kyi sgra yin pa de bzhin du bum pa'i sgra yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dper na shing gi sgra rigs kyi sgra yin pa de bzhin du bum pa'i sgra yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that just as the word ‚Äútree‚Äù is a word for a type, the word ‚Äúpot‚Äù is also like that.

original: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs sa ma spra zhes bya ba la sogs pa tha dad par bstan pa khyad par gang la ltos pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs sa ma spra zhes bya ba la sogs pa tha dad par bstan pa khyad par gang la ltos pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The words ‚Äúform, etc.‚Äù mean that the different teachings such as ‚Äúform,‚Äù ‚Äúsound,‚Äù etc., are dependent upon some distinction.

original: 'bras bu gcig la ltos nas ni bu'i shes pa dang 'brel bar ston pa yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig la ltos nas ni bu'i shes pa dang 'brel bar ston pa yin la /
translated: The meaning is that they are taught to be related to the consciousness of a son, in dependence upon the same effect.

original: so so rang gi 'bras bul ltos nas ni gzugs la sogs par bsnyad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: so so rang gi 'bras bul ltos nas ni gzugs la sogs par bsnyad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are called ‚Äúform,‚Äù etc., in dependence upon their individual effects.

original: di'i 'du byed ba'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos gzhan gyi 'du byed kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: di'i 'du byed ba'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos gzhan gyi 'du byed kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: The phrase in conformity with the conventions of other treatises means in conformity with the conventions of other treatises that are not the present one.

original: 'jig rten na dang por brda sprod par byed pa slob pa'i phyir de 'dra ba'i gzhal bya nyid bya bar byed do //
analyzed: 'jig rten na dang por brda sprod par byed pa slob pa'i phyir de 'dra ba'i gzhal bya nyid bya bar byed do //
translated: In the world, one first learns the conventions of grammar.

original: de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa'i bstan bcos sam /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa'i bstan bcos sam /
translated: Then, one learns the conventions of the treatises of the non-Buddhists.

original: gzhan las dman pa nyid kyis na /
analyzed: gzhan las dman pa nyid kyis na /
translated: Because they are inferior,

original: don de mod la 'dzin te /
analyzed: don de mod la 'dzin te /
translated: one grasps their meaning immediately.

original: don phra mo bstan bcos byad par can las 'dzin par mi nus so //
analyzed: don phra mo bstan bcos byad par can las 'dzin par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to grasp the subtle meaning from the treatises of the Buddhists.

original: phal cher zhes bya ni //
analyzed: phal cher zhes bya ni //
translated: The phrase for the most part

original: dpog pa dang sel ba'i nus pa rnam pa thams cad du ni mi 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: dpog pa dang sel ba'i nus pa rnam pa thams cad du ni mi 'gog pa'o //
translated: means that the ability to infer and to eliminate is not completely blocked.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gang zhig yang dag par rtogs pa dang ldan pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gang zhig yang dag par rtogs pa dang ldan pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: That is why it says, who are endowed with the correct understanding.üîΩThe phrase some

original: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'bras bu'i khyad par nus pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'bras bu'i khyad par nus pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: makes it clear that the special result is the ability.

original: 'dir 'bras bu'i khyad par ci la brjod snyam na /
analyzed: 'dir 'bras bu'i khyad par ci la brjod snyam na /
translated: Here, one might ask, What is the special result that is being referred to?

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The difference in the effect is also called ‚Äúshape.‚Äù

original: yang na gzugs la sogs pa nyid 'ga' zhig dbyibs kyi khyad par gyis rnam par gnas pa ni bum pa yin la zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: yang na gzugs la sogs pa nyid 'ga' zhig dbyibs kyi khyad par gyis rnam par gnas pa ni bum pa yin la zhes 'brel to //
translated: Or else, the difference in shape of form, etc., is called ‚Äúvase.‚Äù

original: ci ltar zhe na dbyibs kyi khyad par grang las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na dbyibs kyi khyad par grang las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How so? ‚ÄúFrom the difference in shape.‚Äù

original: dper na gzugs la sogs pa bum pa yin no zhes bya ba ltar de bzhin du gzugs bum pa yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs na /
analyzed: dper na gzugs la sogs pa bum pa yin no zhes bya ba ltar de bzhin du gzugs bum pa yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs na /

analyzed: gnyi ga 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //

original: byas pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa kho na la 'gyur te /
analyzed: byas pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa kho na la 'gyur te /
translated: Only ‚Äúproduced,‚Äù ‚Äúimpermanent,‚Äù etc., are so.

analyzed: phan tshun 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa bo'i bsam pa'o //

original: grub ba'i mtha' ni 'di ni phan tshun khyab pa'i don ma yin gyi /
analyzed: grub ba'i mtha' ni 'di ni phan tshun khyab pa'i don ma yin gyi /
translated: The VaibhƒÅ·π£ika‚Äôs conclusion is that these are not mutually inclusive,

original: 'on kyang gcig gis gcig 'phen pa yin no /
analyzed: 'on kyang gcig gis gcig 'phen pa yin no /
translated: but rather one is projected by the other.üîΩWhen a tree is mentioned, a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ and a blue color are projected,

original: de ni shing zhes brjod pa na sha pa dang sngon po zhes brjod pa na autpala la yod pa @138a * //
analyzed: de ni shing zhes brjod pa na sha pa dang sngon po zhes brjod pa na autpala la yod pa @138a * //

original: yin te / des na gzhi mthun pa nyams pa med do /
analyzed: yin te / des na gzhi mthun pa nyams pa med do /

original: 'dir ni bum pa'i sgras gzugs tsam 'phen pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'dir ni bum pa'i sgras gzugs tsam 'phen pa ma yin la /

analyzed: gzugs kyi sgras kyang bum pa'i tshogs 'phen pa ma yin te /

original: des na 'di gnyis ni gzhi mthun pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na 'di gnyis ni gzhi mthun pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: 'di gang las she na bum pa'i sgras zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di gang las she na bum pa'i sgras zhes gsungs te /

original: sgras ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgras ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word means ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: nus pa'i khyad par ni gzugs kyi shes ba skyed par rung ba'o //
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par ni gzugs kyi shes ba skyed par rung ba'o //
translated: The specific capacity is the suitability to produce the consciousness of form.

original: yang ji ltar na phyogs gcig pa'i yin yang sha pa la shing gi tha snyad du 'gyur gyi phyogs gcig tu 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa la ni bum pa'i sgra mi 'jug snyam na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na phyogs gcig pa'i yin yang sha pa la shing gi tha snyad du 'gyur gyi phyogs gcig tu 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa la ni bum pa'i sgra mi 'jug snyam na /

original: gna'i tha snyad ces pas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gna'i tha snyad ces pas zhes gsungs so //
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúBecause of the convention of the past.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas brjod pa ni nus pa nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas brjod pa ni nus pa nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is said in response to the opponent‚Äôs view, because the capacity of the term is fixed.

original: bum pa'i sgra ni gzugs tsam la mi 'jug 'on kyang ngo bo nyid kyi tshogs ba kho na la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa'i sgra ni gzugs tsam la mi 'jug 'on kyang ngo bo nyid kyi tshogs ba kho na la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The term pot does not apply to form alone, but it does apply to the collection of intrinsic natures.

original: khyad par gyi nus pa dang ldan ba ni shing sha pa'i nus ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi nus pa dang ldan ba ni shing sha pa'i nus ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The capacity of a branch is the capacity of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree.

original: ji ltar 'dir khyad par can gyi nus pa dang ldan pa 'phen ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dir khyad par can gyi nus pa dang ldan pa 'phen ce na /
translated: How does this imply the capacity of a specific thing?

original: 'dir yang zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes gsungs te /
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúHere also.‚Äù

original: shing gi sgra log go //
analyzed: shing gi sgra log go //

original: phyogs 'dis gzhan yang brjod par bya zhes bya ba la 'jug bar byed pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: phyogs 'dis gzhan yang brjod par bya zhes bya ba la 'jug bar byed pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o /
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúIn this way, one should also consider the others.‚Äù The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that one should consider the following.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nyi shu bya ba zhes smos so //
analyzed: nyi shu bya ba zhes smos so //
translated: The word ‚Äútwenty‚Äù is used.

original: ji ltar bum pa'i sgras nus pa gzhan brjod pa de bzhin nyi shu'i sgras ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar bum pa'i sgras nus pa gzhan brjod pa de bzhin nyi shu'i sgras ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the word ‚Äútwenty‚Äù does not express another potentiality, as the word ‚Äúpot‚Äù does.

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'on kyang zhes smras so //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes smras so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúbut . . .

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyi shur ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyi shur ro //

original: lan ni der ni zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: lan ni der ni zhes bya ba'o /
translated: the answer is ‚Äúthere . . .

original: mang po nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni mang po nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i ba lang la sogs pa dag go //
analyzed: mang po nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni mang po nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i ba lang la sogs pa dag go //
translated: ‚Äù ‚ÄúBy the plurality‚Äù means that the cows, etc., are indicated by the plurality.

original: gal te 'dus pa'i khyad par brjod pa nyi shu'i sgra nyid kyis bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i ba lang rnams rtogs pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'dus pa'i khyad par brjod pa nyi shu'i sgra nyid kyis bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i ba lang rnams rtogs pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: If the word ‚Äútwenty‚Äù itself expresses the particular collection, then wouldn‚Äôt the cows that are engaged in the actions of milking, plowing, and so on be understood?

original: des na ba lang gi sgra sbyar bar ci bya snyam na /
analyzed: des na ba lang gi sgra sbyar bar ci bya snyam na /
translated: What is the point of adding the word ‚Äúcows‚Äù?üîΩHe says, ‚ÄúBy that . . .

original: des ni bzho ba dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des ni bzho ba dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúmilking.‚ÄùüîΩüîΩ

original: gal te bzho ba dang dag la ba'i nus bas kyang 'dus pa'i khyad bar rtogs par byed na de'i tshe lang 'dus pa'i sgra sbyar pas ci bya snyam pa'i dogs pa sel ba ni des kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bzho ba dang dag la ba'i nus bas kyang 'dus pa'i khyad bar rtogs par byed na de'i tshe lang 'dus pa'i sgra sbyar pas ci bya snyam pa'i dogs pa sel ba ni des kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that the difference in the collection is understood by the power of the act of milking and the act of cleaning, then what is the use of adding the word collection to the word cow?

original: des na 'di gnyis kyang khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos por mi 'gal lo snyam du dgongs ba'o //
analyzed: des na 'di gnyis kyang khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos por mi 'gal lo snyam du dgongs ba'o //
translated: The thought is that therefore there is no contradiction in these two being the basis of the qualifier and the qualified.

original: de bzhin don tha dad ba med ba la yang de dang de las ldog pa la brten nas sgra'i don tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin don tha dad ba med ba la yang de dang de las ldog pa la brten nas sgra'i don tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa byas pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, even when there is no difference in meaning, the meaning of the word is posited as different based on the exclusion of that and that.

original: @138b bag chags kyi khyad par la yang brten nas mi 'gal lo zhes bya bar bsams nas brjod pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @138b bag chags kyi khyad par la yang brten nas mi 'gal lo zhes bya bar bsams nas brjod pa ni yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thinking that there is no contradiction based on the difference in latent predispositions, it is said, ‚Äúalternatively.‚Äù

original: thog ma med pa yang yin la tha snyad kyang yin pa ste /
analyzed: thog ma med pa yang yin la tha snyad kyang yin pa ste /
